Content of the month: How much Salary is enough in Singapore (YouTube)Why I like this content: Salary is considered a taboo topic in Singapore due to cultural values of modesty  privacy  and avoiding comparison. Discussing income openly can be seen as boastful or disrespectful  and it may create feelings of inequality or conflict among colleagues. Many companies discourage salary discussions to promote unity and equal treatment.
